lore: Plummeting from his kustom fighta-bommer at the head of his infamous Vulcha Boyz, Boss Zagstruk hits the enemy like a four hundred pound rocket-propelled missile of pure, belligerent fury. Amidst the roar of his blitz missiles and the crunch of bone beneath his cybork foot-klaws, bloody havoc ensues.

otherAbilities.Drill Boss:: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll .
otherAbilities.Plummeting Descent:: You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this modelâ€™s unit in a turn in which it was set up on the battlefield from Reserves .
